intro: Ruschia dubitans, commonly known as the doubtful ruschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant features fleshy, succulent leaves and produces vibrant, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange. It is well adapted to arid environments, with a shallow root system that allows it to thrive in sandy soils. Ruschia dubitans is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and low maintenance requirements.
